taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section setosi;species clausenii;

treatment.description: Differing from no. 140 in its blunt to abruptly short-tipped leaflets; prickles only 3-4 mm. long; leaflets of primocane-foliage rounded-elliptic to elliptic-obovate, the terminal one three-fifths as broad as long; bracteal leaflets similar but smaller; inflorescence overtopped by bracts, its prickleless pedicels up to 3 cm. long; petals narrowly obovate, 1.3-1.4 cm. long, 5-8 mm. broad.
